text: Nelspruit also known as Mbombela is a city in northeastern South Africa. It is also the capital of Mpumalanga Province.| Nelspruit confident of attracting fans - BBC Sport| CNN.com - Ejecting South African pilot killed by truck - Nov. 12, 2003 CNN Nelspruit is home to the Kruger national park which is one of the biggest animal park in South Africa. It is also home to the Mbombela Stadium. == References == Category:20th-century establishments in South Africa Category:Cities in South Africa Category:1905 establishments Category:1900s establishments in Africa Category:Mpumalanga
title: Nelspruit
